title: Pixe 4a 5g won't charge unless switched off. And google is making life hell.
content:
I've been using the Pixel 4a 5g for a while now and the device will not charge when connected to the socket 90% of the time. This is extremely annoying and it dies out everytime I need it. Worst part is, It only charges when it switches off. 

Clearly a software issue. Google. Please fix this crap or take this piece of junk back. Worst mobile phone investment ever!
